text: Scarleth Elizabeth Mercado Lopez (born ) is a Nicaraguan female weightlifter, competing in the 53 kg category and representing Nicaragua at international competitions. She competed at world championships, including at the 2015 World Weightlifting Championships, and 2016 Summer Olympics. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"|Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:250px;"|Venue ! rowspan="2" style="width:60px;"|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"| Total ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2015 || align=left| Houston, United States|| 53 kg ||65|| ~~70~~ || ~~70~~ ||37||85||90|| ~~93~~ ||32||155||34 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Nicaraguan female weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Olympic weightlifters of Nicaragua Category:Weightlifters at the 2016 Summer Olympics
